s.text: Software for the implementation of the statistical estimation and testing procedures described above was written in FORTRAN and run on desktop PCs [ 13].

The additional data filesavailable or from [ 13] consist of several files for implementing the methods described here: NoSeCoLoR.exe is the executable file, compiled for Windows, for the program itself; NoSe-CoLoR-The-Manual.pdf is the user's guide and contains information on input formatting and the interpretation of output files; README.txt contains instructions for installation and start-up;.
